    mregions2 as RDF Why mregions and mregions2?

Function reference

Marine Regions Gazetteer

Functions to access the Marine Regions Gazetteer

MRGID
Marine Regions Global Identifier (MRGID)
gaz_search()
Search in the Marine Regions Gazetteer by names, MRGID or reverse geocode with a pair of WGS84 coordinates x and y
gaz_search_by_type()
Retrieve Gazetteer Records by Placetype
gaz_search_by_source()
Retrieve Gazetteer Records by Source
gaz_types()
Get all the place types of the Marine Regions Gazetteer
gaz_sources()
Get all the Marine Regions sources
gaz_geometry()
Get the geometries of a Marine Regions Geo-Object
gaz_relations()
Walk the hierarchy of the MarineRegions Gazetter given a Gazetteer MRGID or Gazetteer entries

Marine Regions Data Products

List, visualize and download the Marine Regions Data Products, such as the Maritime Boundaries

mrp_list()
Available data products at Marine Regions
mrp_view() mrp_view_eez() mrp_view_eez_boundaries() mrp_view_eez_12nm() mrp_view_eez_24nm() mrp_view_eez_internal_waters() mrp_view_eez_archipelagic_waters() mrp_view_high_seas() mrp_view_ecs() mrp_view_ecs_boundaries() mrp_view_iho() mrp_view_goas() mrp_view_eez_iho() mrp_view_eez_land() mrp_view_longhurst() mrp_view_cds() mrp_view_eca_reg13_nox() mrp_view_eca_reg14_sox_pm() mrp_view_worldheritagemarineprogramme() mrp_view_lme() mrp_view_ecoregions() mrp_view_seavox_v18()
Visualize a Marine Regions data product without downloading
mrp_get()
Get a data product
mrp_colnames()
Get the names of the columns and data type of the data product
mrp_col_unique() mrp_col_distinct()
Get all the possible values of a column of a Marine Regions data product

RESTful services

Low-level functions that interact with the Marine Regions Gazetteer REST web services

gaz_rest
Marine Regions Gazetteer RESTful services
gaz_rest_records_by_name()
Get Gazetteer Records for a given name
gaz_rest_records_by_names()
Get Gazetteer Records for all given names
gaz_rest_record_by_mrgid()
Get one record for the given MRGID
gaz_rest_records_by_lat_long()
Get all gazetteer records where the geometry intersects with the given latitude and longitude
gaz_rest_records_by_type()
Retrieve Gazetteer Records by Placetype
gaz_rest_records_by_source()
Retrieve Gazetteer Records by Source
gaz_rest_relations_by_mrgid()
Retrieve Gazetter Relations by MRGID
gaz_rest_source_by_sourceid()
Get the name of a source by providing a sourceID
gaz_rest_types()
Get all the place types of the Marine Regions Gazetteer
gaz_rest_sources()
Get all the Marine Regions sources
gaz_rest_geometries()
Get the geometries associated with a gazetteer record
gaz_rest_names_by_mrgid()
Get the names for a given MRGID
gaz_rest_wmses()
Get WMS information for a given MRGID

Initialize a Web Feature Service Client

Override mregions2 and make your own WFS calls

mrp_init_wfs_client()
Creates WFS client in Marine Regions
